alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Aitkin, northeastern Cass and northeastern Crow Wing Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Longville, to near Wabedo, to 6 miles northwest of Outing, to near Emily, to 6 miles north of Cuyuna, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Trained spotters have reported pea to nickel size hail with these storms in northern Cass County. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cuyuna around 105 PM CDT. Emily around 110 PM CDT. Outing around 115 PM CDT. Remer and Boy River around 130 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lake Roosevelt, Waukenabo, Cedar Lake, Lake Ada, Ripple Lake, Dads Corner, Glory, Waldeck, Glen and Hassman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
